title: Enjoy the convenience of an in-home washer and dryer! Large space!
posting_body: ['Park Place Northville', 'Bedroom: 2 | Bathroom: 2', 'Square Footage: 1080 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $1624 - $1885', 'show contact info', 'Community Description', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Start your new chapter at Park Place!', 'Our luxury apartments for rent in Northville have everything you need!', 'From spacious floor plans to high-end amenities that are sure to help you live in style and luxury!', 'Click through our photo gallery and see why you should call Park Place your new home in Northville, Michigan!', 'Community Amenities', '◾ 24 Hour Fitness Gym', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Laundry Facilities', '◾ Online Payments Available', '◾ On-Site Maintenance', '◾ Sundeck', '◾ Swimming Pool', '◾ Tennis Court', '◾ Volleyball Court', '◾ Wifi-Cafe', '◾ Center Sidewalks Throughout', '◾ Close to Downtown Northville', '◾ Concierge', '◾ House Plant Watering Service', '◾ Lush Landscaping', '◾ Luxury Building', '◾ Minutes from shopping, dining, and entertainment', '◾ Package Receiving', '◾ Pets Allowed', '◾ Smoke-Free', 'Unit Features', '◾ Built-in Microwave', '◾ Central Air', '◾ Frost Free Refrigerator', '◾ Heating', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Lake Views (Select Units)', '◾ Private Balcony or Patio', '◾ Redesigned Apartment Interiors', '◾ Spacious Master Bedroom', '◾ Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Contact Information', 'Visit Us:', '43001 Northville Place Dr', 'Northville, MI 48167', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon -
